segments.text: Please allow me to introduce myself . My name is Tom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pleased to meet you . My name is Alice . Did you just move in next door ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . Have you lived here long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me ? I guess so . I've lived here for about six years now . Have you lived in America very long ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not really . When I left Vietnam , I came to America and I lived with a cousin in Dallas for two years . Where do you work , Alice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I teach mathematics at a college . What do you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am an accountant at a company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Tom . It's good to meet you . I have to go now . I am teaching a class this evening , and I need to get to the college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's nice meeting you too , Alice .
segments.speaker: S1
